character.name: Angela Martin
character.description: The icy, uptight head of accounting played by Angela Kinsey was a very specific brand of killjoy: lover of cats, enemy of fun. She didn’t laugh much, but we laughed a whole lot watching her — Kinsey could sell a joke with just a withering stare or a crook of her eyebrow — and her passionate affair with Dwight did help bring out a hint of recognizable human emotion in her… only a hint, though.
